abstract: Javier Fernandez wins his fourth straight European figure skating title with best free program at European championships in Slovakia.

headline.main: Spaniard Wins Again at European Figure Skating Championships

snippet: Javier Fernández of Spain won his fourth straight European title with the best free program at the European championships in Bratislava, Slovakia.
lead_paragraph: Javier Fernández of Spain won his fourth straight European title with the best free program at the European championships in Bratislava, Slovakia.
